title.rendered: 12 Best Strategies to Get on The Radar of Senior Leadership

content.rendered: While cold emails might be worth trying as a last resort, there is so much more you can do to strike up a conversation with a desired potential partner or mentor. That’s why we asked 12 entrepreneurs from Young Entrepreneur Council (YEC) how they go about getting the attention of higher-ups. Read it here.

excerpt.rendered: While cold emails might be worth trying as a last resort, there is so much more you can do to strike up a conversation with a desired potential partner or…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Lo mejor y lo peor que nos dijeron en el 2015
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: En Dada Room seguimos creciendo cada día para mejorar la experiencia de nuestros usuarios. Amamos leer sus tweets, mensajes, comentarios, quejas, insultos y todo el feedback que nos dan y que nos sirve para hacer de esta una mejor plataforma ?. Estos son los mejores y peores comentarios que recibimos de…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Los meses de renta que podrías pagar por el precio del iPhone 12 Pro
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Apple lo volvió a hacer. Cada vez que saca un producto nuevo y, en particular, un iPhone nuevo, medio mundo se vuelve loco y quiere comprarse uno no importa cuánto cueste, ni realmente cuáles sean las nuevas características que tenga en teléfono. Es como de "¿a quién le importa el precio…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Enjoying Pubs in NYC Like Barney Stinson
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: If you're a fan of the show, How I Met Your Mother, then you're familiar with the gang's primary hangout spot: MacLaren's Pub. This bar was even based on a real life bar in NYC known as McGee's. So, if you liked seeing Barney Stinson and friends having quality time…

jetpack-related-posts.title: 12 Best Things To Do In Santa Monica
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Santa Monica is a beachfront city in California, bordered by Los Angeles and Santa Monica Bay. Originally inhabited by the Tongva people, today the many attractions have made it a popular tourist city. With a coastal Mediterranean climate, the city has great weather and sunshine almost all year round. If…

jetpack-related-posts.title: 15 Best Things To Do In Dallas
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The big D, a cosmopolitan city known for its high concentration of restaurants and shopping centers awaits you with many cool things to do in Dallas. So whether you're moving here, or just visiting, here are the best things to do in Dallas and places to visit in Dallas you…

jetpack-related-posts.title: 15 Best Things To Do In Austin
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Whether you’ve just moved to the city, or you're visiting for fun, you won’t run out of things to do in Austin. With this guide, Roomi introduces you to the exciting activities and some of the best things to do in Austin! Related: Find Rooms For Rent In Austin, TX…
